snippet: In a span of four weeks, three children ages 5 and under were shot to death in Cleveland, and city leaders are making an emotional plea for the public to help stop the violence.
abstract: Leaders in Cleveland are making emotional appeal to public to help end violence following shooting deaths of three young children in four weeks.
lead_paragraph: In a span of four weeks, three children ages 5 and under were shot to death in Cleveland, and city leaders are making an emotional plea for the public to help stop the violence.

headline.main: Ohio: Police Chief Admonishes Public Over Killings of Children in Cleveland
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Police Chief Admonishes Public Over Killings of Children in Cleveland
